name: DJ Mole
description: A puzzle game with simple mechanics and instant and intuitive gameplay! Collect all the vinyl by moving the coloured blocks wisely.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card Storage: 30 MB available space
